content: That helps a lot, thank you! I'm definitely looking forward to reading "The Interestings". I also want to explore more of Celeste Ng's work, so I'll add "Everything I Never Told You" to my list. By the way, have you got any recommendations for a good pasta sauce recipe? I still remember that kind stranger at the grocery store who helped me with the jar - it was a tall, lanky guy, and we chatted for a bit.
